definition: invulnerable to fear or intimidation, people who are brave, to face and withstand with courage
details:
adjective
- invulnerable to fear or intimidation
= synonyms: audacious
- possessing or displaying courage
= synonyms: courageous
- brightly colored and showy
= example: brightly colored and showy
= synonyms: braw
noun
- people who are brave
= example: people who are brave
- a North American Indian warrior
verb
- to face and withstand with courage
= example: to face and withstand with courage
= synonyms: weather, endure, brave out
